mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_약관법령 목록 조회 (TrmsSttPVO.selectTrmsSttList) */ SELECT trms_stt_aplcn_day, trms_stt_end_day, trms_stt_cn, atch_file_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TRMS_STT" WHERE 1=1 AND trms_stt_cd = #{trmsSttCd}

/* 대국민포털_약관법령 최신글 단건 조회 (TrmsSttMapper.getTrmsSttLatest) */ SELECT trms_stt_aplcn_day, trms_stt_end_day, trms_stt_cn, atch_file_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_TRMS_STT" WHERE 1=1 AND trms_stt_cd = #{trmsSttCd} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC LIMIT 1;
